page.title: Risk analysis export
page.description: The export tool allows you to export the risk analysis you fill in a formatted .json format, ready to be used in calls to create a purpose in machine-to-machine flows.
page.alertInfo: The risk analysis import feature will be available soon.

jsonExportStep.title: Your JSON export
jsonExportStep.successAlert: The risk analysis has been fully compiled and has generated a correctly formatted output.
jsonExportStep.warningAlertTitle: The risk analysis has been partially compiled.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk Analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: Indicate for whom you are compiling this risk analysis.
riskAnalysisSection.privateOption: Managers of public services, public-controlled companies or Private individuals
riskAnalysisSection.warningAlert: You have chosen to compile a risk analysis for a different type of entity than yours. Remember that risk analyzes vary based on the type of entity, so the one you are compiling may not work for you.
